title: Decide Minthara's Fate
content:
ide Minthara's Fate Rewards

145 XP Minthara companion

Decide Minthara's Fate Notes & Tips

Minthara can't be resurrected when escaping the moonrise towers. If you saved Minthara, you can't save the Tiefling in Druid Grove, blocking me from certain quests. Notes & tips go here

Companion Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 A Familiar Face ♦ Balthazar's Experiment ♦ Daughter of Darkness ♦ In Case of Death... ♦ Our fiery friend ♦ The Blade of Frontiers ♦ The Chosen of Shar ♦ The Githyanki Warrior ♦ The Gra
